name: .ASEPRITE-EXTENSION File Extension
summary: Learn about .ASEPRITE-EXTENSION files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can install an ASEPRITE-EXTENSION file in Aseprite (multiplatform). To do so:
Navigate to and open your ASEPRITE-EXTENSION file.
If you want to view an ASEPRITE-EXTENSION file's contents, you can rename it to use the .zip extension and decompress it with any Zip-decompression utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
